items.name: Custom - Stainless Steel Tumbler(20oz)
items.description: A Custom skinny stainless steel tumbler cup(20oz) that keeps contents cold and refreshing for 9+ hours and hot for 3. Stays cold even longer with drinks containing ice. Plus, it comes with a sliding, shatterproof, see-through Lid. Disclaimer: Please visit the Contact page and call or text me in order to discuss the custom order.
